name: Wander (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Wander (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

Arrow Keys - move / Spacebar - Interact with objects

 by Noah Citron , Jack Bailey , Izaaq Ahmad Izham , Ben Haugh

"Wander is a game where you take on the role of a spirit trying to reconnect with his friends. In the game you will need to travel across your old home and find your friends to finally rest in peace. "
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
